title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 115.4 - Waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 115.4 - Waivers

State Regulations

In considering an application, the department may determine, for good cause shown, that lack of compliance with any of the requirements of
this Part does not necessarily preclude approval of the
application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
115.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
